photoURL.description: The URL of the user's profile picture.

phone.description: The user's phone number, especially for vendors, riders, and outlet managers.

status.description: The approval status of the user.

wishlist.description: An array of product IDs in the user's wishlist.

outletId.description: The ID of the outlet this user manages, if applicable.

assignedOutlets.description: An array of outlet IDs that the vendor is allowed to supply to.

fcmTokens.description: An array of FCM tokens for push notifications.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

loyaltyPoints.description: The user's current loyalty point balance.

totalSpent.description: The total amount of money spent by the user.

address.title: Address
address.description: A structured address for deliveries and locations.

point_transaction.title: Point Transaction
point_transaction.description: A log of every loyalty point transaction for a user.

pointsChange.description: Positive for earning, negative for redeeming.

reason.description: Reason for the transaction, e.g., 'Purchase: [OrderID]' or 'Admin Adjustment'.

name.description: The name of the vendor company.

contact.description: The primary contact email for the vendor.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the vendor was added.

outlet.title: Outlet
outlet.description: A physical store location for Averzo.

location.description: The physical address and coordinates of the outlet.

status.description: The operational status of the outlet.

managerId.description: The UID of the user managing this outlet.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the outlet was added.

store_asset.title: Store Asset
store_asset.description: Represents a visual asset used in the storefront, like a hero image or banner.

id.description: Unique identifier for the asset (e.g., hero-carousel-mens-fashion-1).

description.description: A brief description of the image for alt text.

imageUrl.description: The public URL of the hosted image.

imageHint.description: One or two keywords for AI image search suggestions.

link.description: The destination URL when the asset is clicked.

assetType.description: The type of asset, determining where it's used.

categorySlug.description: The category page slug this asset belongs to (e.g., mens-fashion, home).

pos_sale.title: POS Sale
pos_sale.description: Represents a single point-of-sale transaction at an outlet.

id.description: The unique ID of the sale.

outletId.description: The ID of the outlet where the sale occurred.

soldBy.description: The UID of the sales assistant who made the sale.

customerId.description: The UID of the customer, if registered.

discountAmount.description: The amount discounted via a promo code.

promoCode.description: The promo code used for the sale.

order.title: Online Order
order.description: Represents an online order placed by a customer.

subtotal.description: The total value of all items before discounts or shipping.

discountAmount.description: The amount discounted via a promo code.

totalAmount.description: The amount paid by the customer (can be partial for pre-orders).

fullOrderValue.description: The total value of the order, especially for pre-orders with partial payment.

riderId.description: The UID of the rider assigned to this delivery.

product.title: Product
product.description: A product sold on the Averzo platform.

price.description: The base selling price of the product if no variants have specific prices.

compareAtPrice.description: The original price (MRP) to show a discount.

baseSku.description: The base Stock Keeping Unit for the product.

specifications.description: A map of key-value pairs for product specifications.

total_stock.description: Aggregated stock from all variants across all locations.

variants.description: Product variants for different sizes and colors.

image.description: Image URL specific to this variant.

stock.description: Total stock for this variant across all outlets.

compareAtPrice.description: The original price (MRP) for this specific variant.

outlet_stocks.description: Stock count per outlet for this specific variant.

gallery.description: A gallery of additional product images.

videos.description: A list of product video URLs (e.g., YouTube embeds).

discount.description: The calculated discount percentage, derived from price and compareAtPrice.

isNew.description: Flags the product as a new arrival.

isBestSeller.description: Flags the product as a best seller.

isBundle.description: Flags the product as a bundle offer.

giftWithPurchase.description: Details of a free gift offered with the product.

description.description: A short description of the free gift.

preOrder.description: Pre-order specific settings for the product.

flashSale.description: Details for a limited-time flash sale on the product.

question.title: Question
question.description: A customer question about a product.

review.title: Product Review
review.description: A customer's review of a product.

stock_request.title: Stock Request
stock_request.description: A request from a vendor to supply stock to an outlet.

delivery_challan.title: Delivery Challan
delivery_challan.description: A digital document authorizing the transfer of stock from a vendor to an outlet.

stock_transfer.title: Stock Transfer
stock_transfer.description: A request to transfer stock from one outlet to another, initiated by an admin.

requestedBy.description: UID of the admin who initiated the transfer.

code.description: The unique code for the coupon (e.g., WINTER20).

value.description: The discount value (either percentage or fixed amount).

minimumSpend.description: The minimum purchase amount to apply the coupon.

usageLimit.description: Total number of times the coupon can be used.

usedCount.description: How many times the coupon has been used.

expiryDate.description: The expiration date of the coupon.

creatorId.description: The UID of the admin or vendor who created it.

applicableProducts.description: Array of product IDs this coupon applies to. Empty means all.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the coupon was created.

notification_subscription.title: Notification Subscription
notification_subscription.description: Tracks user requests for back-in-stock notifications.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information, including their role, status, and wishlist.

/users/{userId}/points_history/{transact.description: Logs all loyalty point transactions for a user.

/outlets/{outletId}.description: Stores information about physical store locations (outlets).

/store_assets/{assetId}.description: Stores visual assets for the storefront.

/pos_sales/{saleId}.description: Logs all point-of-sale transactions from outlets.

/products/{productId}.description: Stores all product information for the platform.

/products/{productId}/questions/{questio.description: Stores customer questions and answers for a specific product.

/products/{productId}/reviews/{reviewId}.description: Stores customer reviews for a specific product.

/stock_requests/{requestId}.description: Tracks stock movement requests from vendors to outlets.

/delivery_challans/{challanId}.description: Stores delivery challans generated after stock request approvals.

/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores customer online orders routed to specific outlets for fulfillment.

/stock_transfers/{transferId}.description: Tracks inter-outlet stock transfers initiated by admins.

/coupons/{couponId}.description: Stores all promotional codes for discounts.

/notification_subscriptions/{subscriptio.description: Stores all user requests for back-in-stock notifications.
